## BaseAuthoringItem interface

Base interface for all items

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BaseAuthoringItem 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [classification](./api.baseauthoringitem.classification.md) | <code>string</code> | The classification defines the document type. For content items, all documents are classified as "<!-- -->content<!-- -->"<!-- -->. |
|  [created](./api.baseauthoringitem.created.md) | <code>string</code> | The created date of this content item in ISO 8601 with the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ. This field is read only. |
|  [creatorId](./api.baseauthoringitem.creatorid.md) | <code>string</code> |  |
|  [description](./api.baseauthoringitem.description.md) | <code>string</code> | The description of the item. |
|  [id](./api.baseauthoringitem.id.md) | <code>string</code> | The ID of the content item. |
|  [lastModified](./api.baseauthoringitem.lastmodified.md) | <code>string</code> | The last modified date of this content item in ISO 8601 with the format YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ. This field is read only. |
|  [lastModifierId](./api.baseauthoringitem.lastmodifierid.md) | <code>string</code> | name of user for now, this property may change once user management is defined (read only). |
|  [linkedDocId](./api.baseauthoringitem.linkeddocid.md) | <code>string</code> | Optionally the ID of the ready item |
|  [name](./api.baseauthoringitem.name.md) | <code>string</code> | The name of the content item. |
|  [path](./api.baseauthoringitem.path.md) | <code>string</code> |  |
|  [rev](./api.baseauthoringitem.rev.md) | <code>string</code> | The current revision of the document. |
